name: c2m2_portal_etl_specs
title: Subset of transformed C2M2 model with basic data-warehouse techniques and portal UI hints

resources.name: file
resources.title: File
resources.description: A digital asset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this file, unique in combination with this file's id_namespace.

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC (using, e.g., our minid server) and attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: The output of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function after being run on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: md5
fields.description: The output of the MD5 message-digest algorithm after being run as a cryptographic hash function on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information.

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

or.comment: file name, format, data-type, assay-type, anatomy, taxonomy, subject granularity, project, or collection keywords

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the file ID.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the file.

S_super_projects.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the file.

S_dcc.comment: The data coordinating center attributed as source of the file.

S_file_format.comment: The content format of the file.

S_data_type.comment: The type of data represented by the file.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the file was created.

S_described_biosamples.comment: Biosamples described or characterized by the file.

S_anatomy.comment: Anatomy for biosamples described by file.

S_assay_type.comment: Assay type used to generate the file.

S_subject_granularity.comment: The specificity of the subject description, e.g. organism versus cell-line, of subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.

S_subject_role.comment: The taxonomy role(s) of subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.

S_described_subjects.comment: Subjects described or characterized by the file.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the file record as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.

resources.name: biosample
resources.title: Biosample
resources.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this biosample in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this biosample's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this biosample, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this biosample

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

or.comment: biosample identifers/anatomy, file format/assay/data type, subject granularity/role/taxonomy, project, collection keywords

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the biosample ID.

S_assay_type.comment: The assay type(s) of files describing the biosample.

S_anatomy.comment: The anatomy from which the biosample is derived.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing the subject of the biosampling.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the biosample.

S_dcc.comment: The data coordinating center attributed as source of the biosample.

S_super_projects.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the biosample.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the biosample was created.

S_subjects.comment: The subject(s) from which the biosample is derived.

S_described_by_file.comment: Files whose content describes the biosample.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the biosample recor as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

resources.name: subject
resources.title: Subject
resources.description: A biological entity from which a biosample can be generated

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this subject record's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this subject, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this subject

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

or.comment: subject identifiers/granularity/role/taxonomy, biosample anatomy, file format/assay/data type, project, collection keywords

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the subject ID.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the subject.

S_dcc.comment: The Common Fund Program attributed as source of the subject.

S_granularity.comment: The specificity of the subject description, e.g. organism versus cell-line.

S_role.comment: The taxonomic role concept(s) characterizing the subject.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing the subject.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the subject record created.

S_files.comment: Files whose content describes the subject.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the subject record as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

and.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the subject.

resources.name: dcc
resources.title: DCC
resources.description: The Common Fund program or data coordinating center (DCC) that produced the top-level C2M2 metadataset identified by the given project foreign key

fields.name: nid
fields.description: The numeric surrogate key for this record.

fields.name: project
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the top-level C2M2 project record representing byproducts of this DCC.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this DCC, issued by the CFDE-CC.

fields.name: dcc_name
fields.title: DCC Name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this DCC.

fields.name: dcc_abbreviation
fields.title: Abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this DCC.

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Email address of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Name of this DCC's primary contact.

fields.name: dcc_url
fields.description: URL of the front page of the website for this contact's DCC

compact.comment: Identifying and contact information for the program or DCC.

resources.name: project
resources.title: Project
resources.description: A node in the project hierarchy subdividing this id_namespace

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this project in the portal.

fields.name: id_namespace

fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this project's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this project, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this project

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this project

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this project

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this project

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the project ID.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the project was created.

S_dcc.comment: The Common Fund Program containing this project.

and.comment: Direct or indirect ancestor of the project.
Direct or indirect sub-projects of the project.
The granularity of a subject attributed to the project.
The taxonomic role of a subject attributed to the project.
The taxonomy of a subject attributed to the project.
The anatomy of a biosample attributed to the project.
The assay type of a file attributed to the project.
The content format of a file attributed to the project.
The type of data represented by a file attributed to the project.

resources.name: project_in_project
resources.title: project_in_project
resources.description: Association between a child project and its parent

fields.name: parent_project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the parent in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: child_project
fields.description: Numeric ID of the child in this parent-child project pair

resources.name: collection
resources.title: Collection
resources.description: A grouping of files, biosamples and/or subjects

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this collection in the portal.

fields.name: core_fact
fields.title: Numeric ID of core fact class describing this file.
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this file in the portal.

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSÂ±NN:NN

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this collection

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this collection

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this collection

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this collection

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifying the collection ID.

S_project.comment: The project which defined the collection.

S_projects.comment: A project which defined the collection.

S_dcc.comment: The Common Fund Program which defined the collection.

S_super_projects.comment: A project (or super-project) which defined the collection.

S_file_format.comment: The content format of a constituent file.

S_data_type.comment: The type of data represented by a constituent file.

S_assay_type.comment: The assay type of a directly or indirectly constituent biosample.

S_ncbi_taxons.comment: The assay type of a directly or indirectly constituent biosample.

S_subject_granularities.comment: The specificity of a directly or indirectly constituent subject.

S_subject_roles.comment: The role of a directly or indirectly constituent subject.

S_anatomy.comment: The anatomical source of a directly or indirectly constituent biosample.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the collection was created.

and.comment: The time when a constituent file was created.
The time when a constituent biosample was created.
Collections directly or indirectly containing the collection.

resources.name: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.title: Subject Role Taxonomy
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The numeric ID of this subject

fields.name: role
fields.description: The numeric ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

fields.name: taxon
fields.description: The numeric ID of an ncbi_taxonomy taxon

resources.name: assay_type
resources.title: Assay Type
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used in this dataset to describe types of experiment that generate results stored in files

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this assay_type in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

S_biosample.comment: List of biosamples referencing this assay type.

S_collection.comment: List of collections referencing this assay type.

S_file.comment: List of files referencing this assay type.

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.title: NCBI Taxonomy
resources.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe subjects in this dataset

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this taxon in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

fields.name: clade
fields.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon (use 'no rank' if not defined)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

S_subject.comment: List of subjects referencing this taxon.

S_collection.comment: List of collections referencing this taxon.

S_file.comment: List of files referencing this taxon.

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: Anatomy
resources.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (Uberon) CV terms used in this dataset to locate the origin of a biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: nid

fields.name: id

fields.name: name

fields.name: description

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of human-readable synonyms for this term

S_biosample.comment: List of biosamples referencing this anatomical term.

S_collection.comment: List of collections referencing this anatomical term.

S_file.comment: List of files referencing this anatomical term.

resources.name: subject_role
resources.title: Subject Role
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The ontological role of an organism-level constituent component of a subject, e.g.: unitary organism (e.g. 'this subject represents a single orchid and that's it'), host, pathogen, symbiont, taxon detected in microbiome, host associated with microbiome, taxon in lineage of cell line, etc.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_role in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_role

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_role

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_role

S_subject.comment: List of subjects referencing this subject role.

S_collection.comment: List of collections referencing this subject role.

S_file.comment: List of files referencing this subject role.

resources.name: subject_granularity
resources.title: Subject Granularity
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The category of a subject in terms of multiplicity, e.g.: single organism; enumerated group of organisms and their relationships to one another (e.g. host X plus endosymbiont Y); host-associated microbiome; environmental microbiome; cell line

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this subject_granularity in the portal.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_granularity

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_granularity

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_granularity

S_subject.comment: List of subjects referencing this subject granularity.

S_collection.comment: List of collections referencing this subject granularity.

S_file.comment: List of files referencing this subject granularity.

fields.name: kw
fields.description: A pre-computed set of keywords/strings used by the CFDE search UI.

fields.name: num_subjects
fields.description: The number of subjects with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_biosamples
fields.description: The number of biosamples with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_files
fields.description: The number of files with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: num_collections
fields.description: The number of collections with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

fields.name: total_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The sum of size_in_bytes for files with this distinct combination of C2M2 characteristics.

S_dccs.comment: A singular data coordinating center to which a set of C2M2 entities is implicitly attributed.

S_projects.comment: A particular project to which a set of C2M2 entities is explicitly attributed.

S_assay_types.comment: An assay-type CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_data_types.comment: A data-type  CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_mime_types.comment: A MIME type associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_file_formats.comment: A file-format  CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_anatomies.comment: An anatomy CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_granularities.comment: A subject granularity CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_species.comment: A single-organism subject species CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_ncbi_taxons.comment: A taxonomy CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

compact.comment: Project to which a set of C2M2 entities is attributed.

fields.name: nid
fields.title: Numeric ID
fields.description: Numeric, surrogate key representing this fact in the portal.

fields.name: root_project_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID of attributed root project (DCC)

fields.name: project_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID of attributed project

fields.name: assay_type_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID for a file assay type

fields.name: data_type_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID of a file data type

fields.name: file_format_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID for a file format type

fields.name: anatomy_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID for an anatomical source of biosamples

fields.name: granularity_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID for granularity of described subjects

fields.name: species_nid
fields.description: The numeric ID for single organism subject species, a subset of subject taxonomy concepts

fields.name: root_project_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for attributed root project (DCC)

fields.name: root_project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of attributed root project (DCC)

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for attributed project

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of attributed project

fields.name: assay_type_id
fields.description: The numeric ID of a CFDE CV term for generated file assay types

fields.name: data_type_id
fields.description: A CFDE CV term for generated file data types

fields.name: file_format_id
fields.description: A CFDE CV term for generated file format types

fields.name: anatomy_id
fields.description: A CFDE CV term for anatomical sources of collected biosamples

fields.name: granularity_id
fields.description: A CFDE CV term for granularity of described subjects

fields.name: species_id
fields.description: A CFDE CV term for single organism subject species, a subset of subject taxonomy concepts

fields.name: num_files
fields.description: The number of files related to this combination of metadata terms

fields.name: num_bytes
fields.description: The total size in bytes of files related to this combination of metadata terms

fields.name: num_biosamples
fields.description: The number of biosamples related to this combination of metadata terms

fields.name: num_subjects
fields.description: The number of subjects related to this combination of metadata terms

S_root_project.comment: A root project (DCC) to which a set of C2M2 entities is implicitly attributed.

S_project.comment: A particular project to which a set of C2M2 entities is explicitly attributed.

S_assay_type.comment: An assay-type CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_data_type.comment: A data-type  CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_file_format.comment: A file-format  CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_anatomy.comment: An anatomy CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_granularity.comment: A subject granularity CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

S_species.comment: A single-organism subject species CV term associated with a set of C2M2 entities.

compact.comment: Summary counts of file, biosample, and subjects related to each combination of metadata terms.
